snippet: The head of the state-run oil company, Petróleos de Venezuela, has said that it will continue to ship diesel fuel to Syria despite international efforts to isolate the Syrian government.
abstract: Rafael Ramirez, head of the state-run oil company, Petroleos de Venezuela, says that the company will continue to ship diesel fuel to Syria despite efforts by the United States and other countries to isolate the government there.
lead_paragraph: The head of the state-run oil company, Petróleos de Venezuela, has said that it will continue to ship diesel fuel to Syria despite international efforts to isolate the Syrian government.

headline.main: Venezuela: Fuel Still Flows to Syria
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: Fuel Still Flows to Syria
